meanings.sent1: His cowardice prevented him from standing up for his beliefs.
meanings.sent2: The soldier's cowardice was evident as he fled from the battlefield.
meanings.sent3: Despite his cowardice, he managed to muster up the courage to rescue the kitten from the tree.
meanings.sent4: The shadow of cowardice loomed over him, hindering his every step.
meanings.sent5: The stench of cowardice filled the room, suffocating all sense of bravery.
